thread.title: Ellen Pompeo Preps for 'Grey's Anatomy' Directorial Debut While Cradling Infant Son -- See the Precious Pic!
thread.title_full: Ellen Pompeo Preps for 'Grey's Anatomy' Directorial Debut While Cradling Infant Son -- See the Precious Pic!

author: Latifah Muhammad
title: Ellen Pompeo Preps for 'Grey's Anatomy' Directorial Debut While Cradling Infant Son -- See the Precious Pic!
text: Ellen Pompeo Preps for 'Grey's Anatomy' Directorial Debut While Cradling Infant Son -- See the Precious Pic! by Latifah Muhammad 3:05   Playing Ellen Pompeo Preps for 'Grey's Anatomy' Directorial Debut While Cradling Infant Son -- See the Precious Pic! Ellen Pompeo is a multi-tasking mom! The 47-year-old Grey's Anatomy star prepped for her directorial debut while cradling her infant son, Eli, in a precious Instagram pic shared on Tuesday. The candid snap shows Pompeo, who will direct an upcoming Grey's Anatomy episode airing later this season, seated with co-star and fellow director, Debbie Allen. "Directing prep with my mentor and my man," Pompeo wrote along with the hashtag, "#multitaskinglikeamofo." A photo posted by Ellen Pompeo (@ellenpompeo) on Jan 31, 2017 at 1:03pm PST Besides taking over the directorâ€™s chair, the 47-year-old actress is a proud mom of three. Pompeo and her husband, Chris Ivery, have two daughters, Stella Luna , 7, and Sienna May, 2, and welcomed son, Eli, in December. See more on the family's new bundle of joy below.
